pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy SSRT Calculation // This is a collection of functions to calculate stop-signal reaction time (SSRT). Includes functions for both "integration" and "mean" methods; both fixed and adaptive stop-signal delays are supported (see appropriate functions). Calculation is based on Verbruggen et al. (2019) doi:10.7554/eLife.46323.001 and Verbruggen et al. (2013) doi:10.1177/0956797612457390.
